DOC.brief_summary: To explore relationship ability different wheelchair skill participation quality life wheelchair user around home community . The investigator study hypothesis : 1 . Self-reported capacity wheelchair skill ( ability wheelchair skill ) strongly relate self-reported participation . 2 . Self-reported capacity wheelchair skill ( ability wheelchair skill ) related average daily distance travel wheelchair .
DOC.criteria: manual wheelchair home community use ; use manual wheelchair least week ; minimum 3 month experience use manual wheelchair outside hospital setting ; age 18 ; able read understand English follow verbal visual instruction ; competent give informed consent ; willing take part study , include sign consent carefully read ; significant bed rest past month .
